title: EleanorDialog
body:
Oh hello!
You poor dear, you must be lost.
[[Where am I? |EleanorResponse1]] [[Who are you? |EleanorResponse1]]

title: EleanorResponse1
body:
My name's Eleanor, and I'm afraid you're at Hill House.
Before you go further, listen to me.
This place... it's not like any other house I've been to, not like any other house I've seen.
I think it's evil.
Please, you have to help me convince the others to leave.
[[Sure, ok! |EleanorYes]] [[I don't think so... |EleanorNo]]

title: EleanorYes
body:
Thank you, oh thank you!
The others here now!
[[No time like the present! |grouparrival]] [[Lets get out of here! |grouparrival]]

title: EleanorNo
body:
Fine then, I'll convince them myself.
[[You do that. |endeleanordialog]] [[I hope it works out! |endeleanordialog]]

title: grouparrival
body: <<endeleanordialog>>

title: endeleanordialog
body: <<endeleanordialog>>

title: Question1
body:
The floorpan! We couldn’t map it, we couldn’t even walk it without getting lost. 
That’s not just spooky — thats supernatural!
[[That is very peculiar... :|Haunted]] [[Bad interior design does not constitute a haunting :|NotHaunted]]

title: Haunted
body: <<endquestiononehaunted>>

title: NotHaunted
body: <<endquestiononenothaunted>>

title: HauntedEnd1
body:
I can’t say your wrong, we can’t see the tower from our room and we should be able to.
[[That's definitely weird. |EndQuestionOne]] [[How does an entire tower disappear?? |EndQuestionOne]]

title: EndQuestionOne
body: <<endquestionone>>

title: NotHauntedEnd1
body:
A masterpiece of architectural misdirection!
[[I guess... |EndQuestionOne]] [[A Picasso world! |EndQuestionOne]]

title: Question2
body:
The drawing room! Theodora asked Hugh Crain’s spirit for a dance and she didn’t stop seeing things out of the corner of her eye in that room for the rest of the time we were there!
[[I just got goosebumps...  |EndQuestion2Haunted]] [[So Theodora saw nothing? |EndQuestion2NotHaunted]]

title: EndQuestion2Haunted
body: <<endQuestionTwoHaunted>>

title: EndQuestion2NotHaunted
body: <<endquestiontwonothaunted>>

title: HauntedEnd2
body:
Nothing in this house seems to move until you look away. . .
[[All the more reason to leave! |EndQuestionTwo]] [[How are there so many shadows in this room... |EndQuestionTwo]]

title: EndQuestionTwo
body: <<EndQuestionTwo>>

title: NotHauntedEnd2
body:
Bollox, Crain had a unique taste
Just Look at the statue of himself naked and with his small daughters as cherubs.
[[On second thought... |EndQuestionTwo]] [[I'm not sure if that defends Crain... |EndQuestionTwo]]

title: Question3
body:
The pounding in the hallway! Theodora you were with me - We heard it together in our room!
[[That's it--we're leaving |EndQuestion3Haunted]] [['In our room'? |EndQuestion3NotHaunted]]

title: EndQuestion3Haunted
body: <<EndQuestionThreeHaunted>>

title: EndQuestion3NotHaunted
body: <<EndQuestionThreeNotHaunted>>

title: HauntedEnd3
body:
It stayed on our door too, banging like it wanted to get in...
[[Pack your bags! |EndQuestionThree]] [[I think our rides here girls... |EndQuestionThree]]

title: NotHauntedEnd3
body:
I think the house is beginning to get to you Eleanor, you’re becoming hysterical.
[[Hey now, that might not be it... |EndQuestionThree]] [[Are you alright, Eleanor? |EndQuestionThree]]

title: EndQuestionThree
body: <<EndQuestionThree>>

title: EleanorLives
body:
Thank you, thank you, I think they're starting to understand now.
We will leave as soon as we are packed, but you should go now!
While you still can.
[[Good luck! |EleanorLivesEnd]] [[Be safe! |EleanorLivesEnd]]

title: EleanorLivesEnd
body: <<EndHillHouse>>

title: EleanorDies
body:
Why would you offer to help...
And then refuse to say anything helpful?
I'll figure this out on my own--but not before I get out of here!
[[Good Luck! |EleanorDiesEnd]] [[Be safe! |EleanorDiesEnd]]

title: EleanorDiesEnd
body: <<EndHillHouse>>
